official_title: A bill to designate Jackson and Williamson Counties in Illinois as a single metropolitan statistical area.

summary.text: Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to designate the counties of Jackson and Williamson in Illinois as a single metropolitan statistical area.

titles.title: A bill to designate Jackson and Williamson Counties in Illinois as a single metropolitan statistical area.
